link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fenroll.encoresurgicalsupplies.com%2F|title:Enroll%20Now|target:_blank”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”home-about-section”][vc_row][vc_column el_class=”page-heading-div”][vc_single_image image=”2246″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Your Turnkey Surgical Dressing Solution” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%2300aae9″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=””][vc_custom_heading text=”HealPACK is a premium line of surgical dressings, trusted by physicians nationwide to enhance patient healing and improve compliance. Each physician-prescribed, patient-specific order is shipped directly to the patient, ensuring seamless continuity of care, reducing confusion, and saving your practice time and resources.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1706554685212{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_class=”icon-row”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_row_inner el_class=”icon-rows”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”2248″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”home-icons”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”4/5″][vc_column_text]

Streamlined.

All post-surgical supplies for use after initial dressings ordered by physician.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”icon-rows”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”2260″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”home-icons”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”4/5″][vc_column_text]

Easy to Use.

Eliminates uncertainty over continued care & confusion over which products to purchase. Provides education on products & availability.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”icon-rows”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”2259″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”home-icons”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”4/5″][vc_column_text]

Convenient.

No additional trips to the store for surgical dressings – up to one month supply included.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”icon-rows”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”2258″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”home-icons”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”4/5″][vc_column_text]

Compliant.

Deliver prescribed products directly to your patients, boosting patient compliance.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”5px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1708532737857{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”work-list-div”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”2228″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1708029195657{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” image_hovers=”false”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”about-home-text-div”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8″][vc_custom_heading text=”Patient focused. Partnership driven.” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708028328099{margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Improve outcomes by giving your patients the exact products they need, while our proprietary software and automation tools help eliminate errors and meet compliance requirements.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708028337067{margin-left: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_btn title=”Contact us today” color=”danger” align=”center” el_class=”banner-btn-div home-page-leyer-btn” link=”url:%2Fcontact%2F”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”work-list-section”][vc_row][vc_column el_class=”page-heading-div” css=”.vc_custom_1677498598387{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Here’s how HealPACK can benefit your practice” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%2300aae9″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2207″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css=””][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

  • Turnkey product solution standardizes & elevates post-op care. 
  • No inventory means no overhead, no oversight. 
  • Proprietary software tracks & analyzes all orders.  
  • Real-time analytics/billing management eliminates errors & streamlines operations. 
  • Direct ship distribution removes bottlenecks & improves compliance.  
  • Responsive support for claims & documentation. 
  • Total lifecycle solution protects your practice at every touchpoint.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Who We Are” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%231f2957″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore Surgical Supplies is owned and operated by serial entrepreneurs with a track record of success and excellence in the healthcare industry. Their ability to solve complex healthcare related matters has resulted in a positive effect on patient outcomes, while producing hundreds of millions of dollars in revenue to their portfolio of companies.” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300868f” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708616634655{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Over the past decade, they have been at the forefront of major market developments. MedArbor Pharmacy was launched in 2010 for the processing and shipping of thousands of prescriptions monthly. This evolved into the creation and wholesaling a MedArbor National Drug Code (NDC) product, in combination with MedArbor Physician Dispensing for the contracting, credentialing, wholesaling, and management of hundreds of physician dispensing practices across the country.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708530644074{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”In 2015, they diversified into owning and operating commercial and physician-owned clinical laboratories. These labs adopted polymerase chain reaction (PCR)/Molecular testing in 2017, empowering the 2020 birth of MedArbor Diagnostics, one of the earliest validated Covid 19 labs in the country. During this time, their ability to scale and service on demand allowed them to process up to 20,000 samples a day, maintaining a 48 hour turn-around time to provide testing for long term care facilities, hospitals, the NCAA and professional sports teams across the country.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708530659855{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”This team of serial entrepreneurs again expanded their portfolio of clinical laboratories, as part of the ownership group who purchased Cordant Health Solutions. Cordant, now rebranded Navis Clinical Laboratories, is one of the premier behavioral lab testing offerings in the market with locations in Washington, New York, and Massachusetts.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708530804249{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore Surgical Supply’s ownership team, having achieved massive success in pharmacy and diagnostics, now owns and operates a multi-state clinical practice called Encore Wound Care. Encore Wound Care is one of the fastest growing mobile wound clinics in the country, treating thousands of wounds on a weekly basis. Their experience in running their own practice, while supplying Durable Medical Equipment (DME) and surgical supplies to patients, has allowed for the unique opportunity to share their knowledge and platform with outside groups in a variety of modalities, including orthopedics, podiatry, and dermatology.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708530821184{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore Surgical is supported by the Novo Health Care Services software engine, established in 2015 and the “go to” software developer for pharmacy software. Encore’s Novo-based Laboratory Information Systems (LIS), Encore’s Wound Tracker, our established billing modules, and Encore’s proprietary surgical platform are all utilized for both physician practices and Encore’s commercial DME. Novo employs over a dozen full time computer programmers and software engineers, providing excellent tech support and the ability to tailor offerings specific to the customer’s needs.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708530833716{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore Surgical’s experience and track record of success in the healthcare industry provides a competitive advantage to their practice partners.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708538810930{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1739499266011{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_custom_heading text=”For more information on our portfolio of companies please visit our websites below” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%2300aae9″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1708538249971{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”10″ disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1739499269916{margin-bottom: 100px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1708616883531{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2442″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1708537960598{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://medarbor.com/”][vc_btn title=”Visit Website” color=”danger” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmedarbor.com%2F|title:Visit%20Website|target:_blank” el_class=”banner-btn-div”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1708616890386{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2441″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1708537987985{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://www.EncoreClinicalServices.com”][vc_btn title=”Visit Website” color=”danger” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.EncoreClinicalServices.com|title:Visit%20Website|target:_blank” el_class=”banner-btn-div”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1708616899521{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2444″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1708537993236{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://novohcs.com/”][vc_btn title=”Visit Website” color=”danger” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fnovohcs.com%2F|title:Visit%20Website|target:_blank” el_class=”banner-btn-div”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1710279921475{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2443″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1708538470996{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://navisclinical.com/”][vc_btn title=”Visit Website” color=”danger” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fnavisclinical.com%2F|title:Visit%20Website|target:_blank” el_class=”banner-btn-div”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
